title: Software Developer
description: Design, develop, and maintain software applications and systems using various programming languages and technologies.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Strong programming skills in multiple languages

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Create intuitive and engaging user experiences for digital products through research, design, and collaboration.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design, HCI, or related field
Proficiency in design tools like Figma, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze complex data to extract insights and drive business decisions using statistical methods and machine learning.
requirements: Master's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related field
Statistical analysis and data visualization skills

title: Digital Marketing Manager
description: Develop and execute digital marketing strategies across multiple channels to drive brand awareness and customer acquisition.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field
Experience with digital marketing tools and platforms
Strong analytical and creative thinking skills
Understanding of SEO, SEM, and social media marketing
